Maciej A. Czyzewski Archive Research Projects Talks About

Evolution of drones, bionic birds & bees

Posted on 24 August 2015 Tweet

Seeing a flying drone cease to amaze me, but recently I began to see interesting objects ever stranger shapes and sizes. Drones are getting quieter and smaller…

Birds

The most intresting project it’s a bird-shaped drone called Bionic Bird. This new mechanical bird, is app controlled, using a Bluetooth 4.0 link to support 100 meters of remote controlled flight from your smartphone or tablet.

It looks naturally so can confuse animals and camouflage in the landscape.

More

Learn more interesting things, here:

  • “Green Brain” to create an autonomous flying robot with a honey bee brain
  • Bionic Bird: the Furtive Drone
